short_desc: Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək team featured on Azerbaijan’s National Cultural Television; “Mədəniyət TV”.
long_desc: On February 28th, Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək team was invited to Azerbaijan’s National Cultural Television; “Mədəniyət TV” for an interview and to talk about our projects and endeavors. Our president - Yusuf Karimli, head organizer - Yusif Mammadov and one of the organizers - Aysu Taghiyeva proudly represented us on the Television. Watch the full video in the attached link 🔗; https://www.instagram.com/reel/C37jwRQoimR/?igsh=YTBxczdnNGtwZGFx

short_desc: Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək team featured on Azerbaijan’s National RADIO AZTV Radio(105FM).
long_desc: On May 1st, Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək team was invited to Azerbaijan’s National RADIO AZTV Radio(105FM) for an interview and to talk about our projects and endeavors. Our president - Yusuf Karimli and vice president - Sabina Abishova proudly represented us on the national radio/television network. Watch the full video clicking the attached link 🔗; https://www.instagram.com/reel/C69jPE2rSQv/?igsh=M2szanRzMnE3bW90

short_desc: Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək team featured on ARAZ FM at Khazar Media Center.
long_desc: On June 1st, Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək team was invited to ARAZ FM at Khazar Media Center to reflect on experiences and future plans of the organization highlighting children on a special international children day. Our Founder - Yusuf Karimli, Head Organizer - Yusif Mammadov, and Head of Human Resources Department - Vusal Baghirli have spoken on our behalf! Watch full video at: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7qs3mno8Nz/?igsh=MXJncGNkbHE5enY2Mg==

short_desc: Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək featured at New York Times Square.
long_desc: Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək became the first youth-led society from Azerbaijan to be featured at New York Times Square on June 19th! Featuring experiences and all and any children we supported, we are proud to achieve one of our ultimate goals for 2024! (this news has a video too)

short_desc: Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək Team discussed future plans on AzTV.
long_desc: Uşaqlarımıza Öyrədək Team talked about the future plans for NASA Space Apps Challenge and reflected on experiences at the National Television of Azerbaijan - AzTV on September 26th. Our founder, vice president and HR Team member has spoken on our behalf! Full interview: https://www.instagram.com/reel/DAdgtIXoDvM/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

short_desc: Xezer TV covered NASA Space Apps Challenge Baku 2024.
long_desc: Thanks to Khazar Media Center, Xezer TV attended the opening of the NASA Space Apps Challenge Baku 2024: the first youth-led NASA event in the region and broadcasted the event along with an interview of our founder to Xezer TV in the news on October 6th, 2024. Watch the full video at: https://www.instagram.com/reel/DA8Cv5-oDCt/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

short_desc: NASA Space Apps Challenge Baku 2024 featured at Baku.ws News Agency.
long_desc: Press release of NASA Space Apps Challenge Baku 2024, was featured at Baku.ws News Agency: “the first youth-led NASA event in the region was hosted by Yusuf Karimli and his team of passionate and young organizers.” Read at: https://baku.ws/social/nasa-space-apps-challenge-tedbiri-bakida-yusuf-kerimli-ve-genc-komandasi-ile-birlikde-boyuk-ugurla-kecirilib
